entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 8:58 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:58 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
